title: Rotor UAV
explain: With different payload, rotor UAV can be used in different field, such as surveillance on site, target check, communication relay and air special strike, as well as anti-terrorist, police patrol, disaster relief, electric-power patrol, survey, etc. It features by simple operation and easy-to-carry.
features:
Main Functions

  • With functions of a key take-off, onsite landing, return landing, flight forward/ reverse, side flight, horizon rotating flight, air fixed-point hovering, hand-control, and programmed-control
  • Two flight control modes: hand control and programmed control
  • Operating at L-band, adopting TDMA technology, supporting 1080P image transmission in real time
  • Bei Dou/GPS two-mode integrated navigation positioning, adopting dual antennae to perform satellite direction and has good anti-jamming capability
  • Planning of flight route, flight point and mission point hovering time, etc
  • Function of integrated information display, record and playback, the ground station can record, display and playback geographic information, flight state and mission payload data, etc
  • System protection function includes system self-test, return landing once remote-control interrupted or shortage of voltage, onsite landing once navigation signals loss
  • Different mission payloads can be carried, including optical reconnaissance, electronic reconnaissance and fire strike
form:
Main Specifications
Weight of rotor UAV (including battery)6-rotor ≤10Kg，4-rotor ≤8Kg
Max. loading weight6-rotor: 5Kg，4-rotor: 2Kg
Unfolding size6-rotor：Diameter:220 cm，height:60 cm
4-rotor：Diameter:180 cm，height:42 cm
Withdrawn size6-rotor：Diameter:45 cm，height:87 cm
4-rotor：Diameter:31 cm，height:64 cm
Endurance time6-rotor：60min（1kg payload），40min（5kg payload）
4-rotor：50min（1kg payload），30min（2kg payload）
Service ceiling1000m（Plain）
Max. flight speed50km/h
Max. climbing speed5m/s
Operating distance10km
Data transmission rate6Mbps, 1080P high definition image
Anti-wind≤12 m/s
TransportationBackpack or carried by vehicle（the vehicle can be refitted according to user`s requirement）
